name: CSV (Comma-Separated Values X,Y,Z,Red,Green,Blue)
description: CSV file with columns for x, y, z, red, green, and blue

name: MeshLab XYZ (Point Coordinates Only)
description: x y z coordinates only.  Perfect for MeshLab

name: OBJ Vertexes & Color
description: x y z red green blue.  Encoding of vertex color in OBJ is unofficial and not widely supported, though.

name: XYZ (Chemical Geometry Coordinates)
description: A popular format for 3D models of atomic positions in molecules described more at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XYZ_file_format

name: XYZ (Point Count & Point Coordinates)
description: Includes a single point count and x y z coordinates only.  Not intended for chemistry software or importing to MeshLab
